geographical_features: access to the Atlantic Ocean and the Mediterranean Sea; major rivers (Seine, Loire, Rhône, Garonne); diverse terrain including plains, mountain ranges (Alps, Pyrenees), and maritime regions
climate: temperate, Mediterranean in the south, oceanic in the west
economic_strengths: aerospace, defense industry, nuclear energy, automotive, luxury goods, agrifood, pharmaceuticals, advanced research and technology, strong tourism sector
army_size: approx. 205,000 active personnel plus strategic nuclear forces
digitalization_level: high — strong telecom infrastructure and expanding digital services
political_economic_threats: EU fragmentation risks; energy transition pressures; public debt challenges; regional separatism; social unrest; competition from emerging economies
military_threats: terrorism, hybrid/cyber threats, instability in North Africa and the Sahel, global power competition
development_milestones: stable republic since 1958; founding member of EU and NATO; nuclear power since 1960; advanced infrastructure and global diplomatic influence
